data.name: Glorious Charge
data.description: Adds the Glorious Charge ability to Outposts, when activated it starts a 10 second timer which reveals the Outpost and the nearby area to all players, when the timer ends all nearby allied units will get +50% movement speed and take -15% less damage for 30 seconds.

variations.name: Glorious Charge
variations.description: Adds the Glorious Charge ability to Outposts, when activated it starts a 10 second timer which reveals the Outpost and the nearby area to all players, when the timer ends all nearby allied units will get +50% movement speed and take -15% less damage for 30 seconds.
variations.descriptionCN: 为哨站添加“荣光冲锋”能力。此能力在启用时会产生一个时长为 10 秒的计时器，并在此期间向所有玩家显示哨站及其附近区域。当计时器结束时，哨站附近的所有盟友单位将获得 +50% 移动速度，受到的伤害 -15%，持续 30 秒。

data.name: Muscovy Yasak
data.description:
The conquered Rus territories will provide larger shields to Heavy Infantry and Heavy Cavalry, increasing their ranged armor by +2. 
Wood will also be generated at the rate of 200 per minute, but it is reduced by 2 Wood for each unit equipped with a Rus shield.

variations.name: Muscovy Yasak
variations.description:
The conquered Rus territories will provide larger shields to Heavy Infantry and Heavy Cavalry, increasing their ranged armor by +2. 
Wood will also be generated at the rate of 200 per minute, but it is reduced by 2 Wood for each unit equipped with a Rus shield.
variations.descriptionCN:
被征服的罗斯领土将为重装步兵和重装骑兵提供更大的护盾，使他们的远程护甲 +2。
木材也会以每分钟 200 的速率生成，但对于每个装备罗斯护盾的单位，木材 -2。

data.name: Professional Scouts
data.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar. Deer slowly decay while being carried.

variations.name: Professional Scouts
variations.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar. Deer slowly decay while being carried.
variations.descriptionCN:
侦察兵获得携带动物尸骸的能力，且对野生动物造成的伤害 +100%。
侦察兵在携带动物尸骸时移动速度 -55%，且无法拾取野猪尸骸。若携带的是鹿尸骸，则会缓慢腐烂。

variations.name: Stables Reinforcements
variations.description: Stables batch production increased by +1, does not increase resource cost or time to recruit. The Torguud batch production is also increased by +1.
variations.descriptionCN: 马厩批量生产 +1，不会增加资源成本或招募时间。此外，还有土尔扈特批量生产 +1。

data.name: Steeled Arrow
data.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.

variations.name: Steeled Arrow
variations.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.
variations.descriptionCN: 所有弓箭和弩箭的远程伤害 +1。

data.name: Stone Armies
data.description: The Golden Tent can rapidly produce unique units at a discounted Stone cost and Rus Tributes are upgraded with increased armor and a bardiche axe.

variations.name: Stone Armies
variations.description: The Golden Tent can rapidly produce unique units at a discounted Stone cost and Rus Tributes are upgraded with increased armor and a bardiche axe.
variations.descriptionCN: 黄金帐篷能够以折扣后的石料成本快速生产独特单位，并且罗斯贡品升级为增强的护甲和一把新月战斧。

data.name: Stone Commerce
data.description: Traders supply +10% Stone to their trades.

variations.name: Stone Commerce
variations.description: Traders supply +10% Stone to their trades.
variations.descriptionCN: 商人交易时供应的石料 +10%。

data.name: Survival Techniques
data.description: Increase Villagers' hunted meat gather rate by +15%.

variations.name: Survival Techniques
variations.description: Increase Villagers' hunted meat gather rate by +15%.
variations.descriptionCN: 村民狩猎肉类采集速率 +15%。

data.name: Swivel Cannon
data.description: Springald Ships gain an additional Cannon which fires in 360 degrees.

variations.name: Swivel Cannon
variations.description: Springald Ships gain an additional Cannon which fires in 360 degrees.
variations.descriptionCN: 扭力弩炮船获得了一门额外的加农炮，可以 360 度射击。

data.name: Textiles
data.description: Increase Villagers' health by +50%.

variations.name: Textiles
variations.description: Increase Villagers' health by +50%.
variations.descriptionCN: 村民生命值 +50%。

data.name: Triple Shot
data.description: Kipchak Archers fire 2 additional arrows that each deal 50% less damage.

variations.name: Triple Shot
variations.description: Kipchak Archers fire 2 additional arrows that each deal 50% less damage.
variations.descriptionCN: 钦察弓兵会额外发射 2 箭矢，每支箭矢造成的伤害 -50%。

data.name: Unlock Kharash Edict
data.description: When the Kharash Edict is active the Golden Tent and Military Buildings within the influence of a Fortified Outpost produce an additional Kharash whenever any unit is recruited.

variations.name: Unlock Kharash Edict
variations.description: When the Kharash Edict is active the Golden Tent and Military Buildings within the influence of a Fortified Outpost produce an additional Kharash whenever any unit is recruited.
variations.descriptionCN: 启用肉盾法令后，每当招募任何单位时，强化哨站影响范围内的黄金帐篷和军事建筑都会额外生产一个肉盾。

data.name: Unlock Stockyard Edict
data.description: When the Stockyard Edict is active Stockyards within the influence of a Fortified Outpost generate Gold while being worked.

variations.name: Unlock Stockyard Edict
variations.description: When the Stockyard Edict is active Stockyards within the influence of a Fortified Outpost generate Gold while being worked.
variations.descriptionCN: 启用牲畜围栏法令后，强化哨站影响范围内的牲畜围栏在被使用时会生产黄金。

data.name: Wedge Rivets
data.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.

variations.name: Wedge Rivets
variations.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.
variations.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Wheelbarrow
data.description: Increase the carry capacity of Villagers by +5 and their movement speed by +15%.

variations.name: Wheelbarrow
variations.description: Increase the carry capacity of Villagers by +5 and their movement speed by +15%.
variations.descriptionCN: 村民的运载量 +5，移动速度 +15%。

data.name: Yam Network Trade
data.description: The Golden Tent will generate 10 Gold every 10 seconds for each Fortified Outpost, up to a maximum of 6 Fortified Outposts.

variations.name: Yam Network Trade
variations.description: The Golden Tent will generate 10 Gold every 10 seconds for each Fortified Outpost, up to a maximum of 6 Fortified Outposts.
variations.descriptionCN: 黄金帐篷每 10 秒为每一座强化哨站产生 10 黄金，最多适用于 6 座强化哨站。
